line_1: Just now we're living sound an' hale;
line_2: But why, o' Death, begin a tale?

line_1: Just now we're living sound an' hale;
line_2: Then top and maintop croud the sail,

line_1: Just now we're living sound an' hale;
'While ye are pleas'd to keep me hale,
line_2: ' I'll fit down o'er my scanty meal,

line_1: 'While ye are pleas'd to keep me hale,
'While ye are pleas'd to keep me hale,
line_2: ' As lang's the Muses dinna fail
